input.label: Select Hosts:
input.populatingSearch: | metadata type=hosts `collectd_index` | search $envmultiselect$ totalCount>0 | dedup "host" | sort "host" | regex host="^[^\d]" | table "host"

input.label: Select Partition
input.populatingSearch: `collectd_index` object="df-*" (object!="df-dev" AND object!="df-run-shm" AND object!="df-run-lock" AND object!="df-run-shm" AND object!="df-run")| dedup "object" | eval object_new=replace(object,"df-","/") | eval object_new=replace(object_new,"-","/") | sort "object_new" | table "object_new" object

search.query: search `collectd_index` object="df-*" (df_complex_used=* OR df_complex_free=* OR df_complex_reserved=*) | stats earliest(df_complex_used) as lastused latest(df_complex_used) as used latest(df_complex_free) as free latest(df_complex_reserved) as reserved by host object

chart.title: Storage increase by host in GB

search.query: eval deltaused = used-lastused | eval full=free+used | stats sum(deltaused) as GB by host | eval GB=round(GB/1024/1024/1024,2) | sort -GB | search $hostmultiselect$ $envmultiselect$

eval deltaused = used-lastused | eval size=free+used | stats sum(deltaused) as deltabytes sum(used) as usedbytes sum(free) as freebytes sum(reserved) as reservedbytes by host | sort -deltabytes | table host deltabytes usedbytes freebytes reservedbytes | eval deltabytes=`format_bytes(deltabytes)` | eval freebytes=`format_bytes(freebytes)` | eval usedbytes=`format_bytes(usedbytes)` | eval reservedbytes=`format_bytes(reservedbytes)` | search $hostmultiselect$ $envmultiselect$

search $hostmultiselect$ $envmultiselect$ object="$partition$" | eval fullsize=free+used+reserved | eval freeout=`format_bytes_new(free)` | eval usedout=`format_bytes_new(used )` | eval reservedout=`format_bytes_new(reserved)` | eval fullout=`format_bytes_new(fullsize)` | eval percentused = (used/fullsize)*100 | eval percentused = round(percentused) | eval deltaused = used-lastused | search deltaused!=0 | rename fullout as size | eval partitionorg = object | eval partition=replace(object,"df-","/") | eval partition=replace(partition,"-","/") | rename deltaused as delta | sort -delta | eval delta=`format_bytes_new(delta)` | rename delta as storageincrease | rename usedout as usage | rename freeout as free | table host partition storageincrease size usage freeout percentused partitionorg

chart.title: free vs. used by host in GB
chart.searchString: | search $hostmultiselect$ $envmultiselect$ object="$partition$" | chart sum(used) as totalused sum(free) as totalfree sum(reserved) as totalreserved by host | sort -totalused | eval totalused=round(totalused/1024/1024/1024,2) | eval totalfree=round(totalfree/1024/1024/1024,2) | eval totalreserved=round(totalreserved/1024/1024/1024,2)

table.title: Avg Used Space host and partition
table.searchString: `collectd_index` $hostmultiselect$ $envmultiselect$ metric="df_complex-used" object="$partition$" | stats avg(value) AS bytes by host object | sort -bytes | eval UsedMem = `format_bytes_new(bytes)` | eval Partition=replace(object,"df-","/") | table host Partition UsedMem
